## `SetGradeScale`

Sets the grade scales\index{grade scales} used to display test scores for new projects.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetGradeScale(GradeScale scale)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| [`GradeScale`](#gradescale) scale | The grade scale to use. |
:::
